descriptions.english: An hospitable force from another world. They are unknowingly taking part in something greater than they should be. The Sweetkin are often more than what people can chew.

subclass_descriptions.english: Ally yourself with the outerwordly and enticingly sugary SweetKin

lore_tooltips.english: The Sweetkin's boss seems to always keep his cool but this creature from out-of-hell certainly does not hold back when provoked.

descriptions.english: Apply [Sap] [effect0.status0.power] to all enemies. Apply +[effect1.power][health] to all allies

lore_tooltips.english: 'Come in! There is enough for everybody!' -Rosette during one of the many Winged invasion

descriptions.english: Kill a non-boss enemy unit and give all the other [effect1.status0.power] armor

lore_tooltips.english: 'A cruel parasitory concept learned from another world by Father. He wasn't sure if I should even able to do as such. It seems like i have a certain 'Floofty' to thank that for.'-Rosette

descriptions.english: Apply [effect0.status0.power] [lifesteal] [effect2.status0.power] Rage and [effect1.status0.power] [armor] to all friendly units

lore_tooltips.english: The various clans aboard the Boneshaker got the chance to watch the various talent shows hosted by the Sweetkin. The process leads to some gruesome events that lead to entertaining shows for the passengers.

descriptions.english: Apply 3 pyregel to the strongest character in all rooms, then draw 2 cards

lore_tooltips.english: The smell of charred wood and ashes are a reminder of your Successes

names.english: Fight Till The Last One Drops

lore_tooltips.english: 'Power fantasy is a dangerous thing. You would be surprised at how much wisdom is required just to not harm oneself when using a brand new power.'-Rosette
'This world's timeline is stuck in a loop. We can help some loops to achieve peace at the very least.'-Rosette

descriptions.english: Reserve: Apply 3 frostbite to the weakest character in all rooms

lore_tooltips.english: The frostbite and numbness is the reminder of your failures

descriptions.english: Heal an ally by [effect0.power] and Retreat

lore_tooltips.english: The Sweetkin have an uncanny sense of duty and will be more than willing to help their coworkers regardless of rank or situation. This comes particularly handy in lowering the amount of casualties during the journey to Hell's core.
The Sweetkin are expert caterers who have been able to supply enough edible matter to sustain even the most hungry member of the Umbra.

descriptions.english: Heal [effect0.power] and Apply +[effect1.power][health] to an ally

lore_tooltips.english: 'Any respected establishment need a proper set of medical specialist. There are no ways to know when an emergency will arise.'-Rosette
The Sweetkins are not against guerilla warfare as they use every floor to the best of their abilities.

descriptions.english: Deal [effect0.power] damage to the front enemy and push them to the back. Deal [effect1.power] damage to all enemies

lore_tooltips.english: 'Rowdy clients takes the door. That's the rule...'-Rosette

descriptions.english: Apply [effect0.status0.power] armor [effect1.status0.power] Rage and Quick to an ally

lore_tooltips.english: A wide array of meals seems always at the ready. Exotic food seems the like the norm until they figure out every clan's preference.
'Sometimes you just have to convince them that they are not at the right spot. We never know who will decide to become a faithful patron.'-Rosette
'Welcome dear friends! We are the Sweetkin. I have been informed that you might need some help. Am I wrong?'-Rosette

descriptions.english: Heal [effect0.power] and Apply [effect1.status0.power] Buffet to an ally

lore_tooltips.english: 'It's important to differentiate between cold rooms with leftovers and replacement limbs. This saves time and keeps circulation flowing during rushes.'-Rosette

descriptions.english: [descend] a unit to the bottom floor

lore_tooltips.english: 'And how do you think we came to your world?'-Rosette
The Sweetkin's traveled to the library of ruins, where Rosette's eldest sibling cursed Sally with the power of EGO. Beware those who threaten the Sweetkins, for the forest of Evergreen endures.
Many loops, many paradoxes. This version of Sally exist outside of time, soon to disapear. Guide the Sweetkins to victory before they seize to be.
'EUREKA! Just add hot sauce! That should fix this mess!'-Red
'Symbolism also helps with how a living being should act. You might not know this creature since it inhabits a different version of Hell.'-Rosette
Even the smallest of Sweetkin does not back down if there is a chance of success. This hastily made guard proved itself a loyal ally to any would be 'Employer'.
Some of the Sweetkin are mass produced by a dedicated being. This one seems to be bent on preventing one's advance inside our walls using...Dubious methods.
'Time to cook up a storm! Cover me while I prepare us something!'-Sweetkin Cook
The newly created Sweetkin is a unique individual from the start regardless of his size or shape. But their general demeanor seems influenced by Rosette's whims.
'Are you alright? Let me make sure you can last the whole battle!'- Sweetkin Maid nursing a dreg

descriptions.english: Heal [effect1.power] hp and cure all status from allies on the floor

lore_tooltips.english: Mint took care of whomever she could that came from hell. She earned herself a partner, to whom she gave a name and safety from the divinity's scheme.
An animated effigy to another creator. One who sought balance and brought it to the sweetkins as well.
Some wealthy imps have taken a liking to the pampering provided by the Sweetkin. Their donations seem to be enough to stir the Sweetkin into providing little extras for any Hellborn nearby.
A seed of a converted soul, a stowaway in the care of the Sweetkins. It will grow into a fine hollow.
'Bookburners? ON THE TRAIN? SAVE THE BOOK, DON'T LET THEM GET AWAY!' -Sweet Cherry Sally
Progenitor of the sweetkin and director of a dimensional spa. They are taking a more passive role this time.
The most luxurious and dangerous ride in all of limbo! Something she will be able to gossip about to all her wicker friends.
Requesting to be turned into exquisite cuisine is not the worst thing a Beyonder could ask as a way to relax.
New places to go to. New diseases to catalog and experiment with.
'This level is forbidden dear guest. Please use the stairs back to the bottom floor. No? Then may I provide some desert?'-Sweetkin Butler

The Sweetkin have several morsel like creature and yet the smaller ones seems to have been designed for consumption rather than manual labor. This makes them a lot less useful than the umbra workforce.
'Delivery service at your command! What can i do for you today? (Dove Cooing) '-Sweetkin's Delivery Service

Its trees being cut one by one with no seeds being set in its place to regrow it. The harsh Environment would soon lay ruin to whom remain standing. The sun would dry the soil and set us ablaze. The Locust would eat those healthy enough to bare leaves. Winter would freeze them all to death. Soon, only the Lone sprout remained, growing in the ashes of its siblings.
'And this one was the first molded with the help of my eldest brother. I'l say that he did wonderful work.'-Rosette
'Are you alright? Let me make sure you can last the whole battle!'- Sweetkin Maid nursing a dreg

descriptions.english: Summon a random VIP Unit. Delay 1

lore_tooltips.english: This gargantuan creature is in charge of recycling the few fallen who cannot be saved. Granting them a second wind that might ultimately shift the balance in our favor.
A glacial atmosphere surrounded the giantess's room. It suppressed the Pyre influence but did not harm bare flesh of any friendly visitor. The same could not be said of those who attacked blindly.
It is strange to see your potential last meal run to your help. It certainly puts into perspective one's life choice.
A Book containing the essence of various Spicy Sweetkins. Created in bulk for the Buffet at the Library of Ruin, with few copies confiscated from visiting librarians by Sally.
A Book stained with minty blood. The catalyst for the curse bestoyed upon Sally within the Library of Ruin.
A book containing the essence of a handful of minty sweetkins. Retrieved from passing librarians in their dimension.
'Remember what I said about symbolism? Well at least this one could be a weapon.'-Rosette, still confused about utencils warfare.
I Love Morsels...Me too buddy. Me Too.
'Our doves are more akin to a living tool than actual animals. They certainly do the job when it comes time of quickly moving small objects around.' -Rosette
An experimental solution for when you need to nestle between your allies.
A Book containing the essence of various Sour Sweetkins. Lime Was the first to enter the Library of the Pale Librarian at Rosette's request.
Made to keep moisture in. Perfect for an emergency bandage.
'Don't mind the crab roaming the halls with an arm. Their name is handzy' -Lime
One would think a war of attrition would benefit the defenders of Haven's siege. The Sweetkin thinks otherwise, providing ample supplies directly to the front.

descriptions.english: At the end of the turn, give 3 regen to all units in the room.

lore_tooltips.english: A delightfully relaxing time awaits the Sweetkin's patrons. A quick dip in a pool with restaurative properties brings vigor to weary warriors.
The Sweetkins pride themselves on a large, zero gravity room able to emulate space within their home dimension. This version is smaller, fit for the train.

descriptions.english: Summon a a crab cake or a Danger noodle at the end of the turn.

lore_tooltips.english: The closest thing to a primordial soup for the Sweetkins, big or small. It is unable to produce complex Sweetkins without Rosette.

descriptions.english: Summon a Random VIP at the end of the turn.

lore_tooltips.english: An imitation of the Sweetkin's portal room. A great place to bring visitor from Hell, Haven and realms between.

descriptions.english: Apply 3 frostbite to the weakest character in all rooms
Add a random VIP to your hand
Add a random VIP to your hand
Add two random VIPs to your hand
At the end of the turn, give 3 regen to all units in the room.
Summon a a crab cake or a Danger noodle at the end of the turn.
Summon a Random VIP at the end of the turn.
Add a random VIP to your hand
Add two random VIPs to your hand
Add three random VIPs to your hand
Apply Buffet [effect0.status0.power] to all allies on the floor
Add a Sweetkin book to your hand
Apply 6[attack] and 12[health] to friendly units on the floor
Eater gains 11[attack] and 11[health] and retreat them
Apply Frost [effect0.status0.power] to all enemies on the floor.
Kill the unit with the lowest HP on the train
Add Summer's wildfires to your deck
Add a Winter's snowstorms to your deck
Summon a Sour guard and Retreat the front friendly unit.
Apply Frost [effect0.status0.power] to all enemies on the floor

added_expressions.english: Do your worst, I won't be vanquished.

idle_expressions.english: Gotta keep an eye for any Bookburners.
I understand how it feels to be on the flipside.
Relaxation can wait, we got your world to save.
Red...why did you do this to me?
Never again will I lose my sisters.

added_expressions.english: I am Sally, your hostess for today.

idle_expressions.english: The way to a Pony's heart is throught their stomach!
*Echoes of the past cannot remain for long*
I shall make Rosette proud!
Did the train always have these Rooms?
Hello! *Time loop* Hello!
RAAAAaaaaAAAG!
*Hot sauce turns to steam*
Awoooooooooooooo!
BARK! BARK!
Requesting Recycler support.
Troublemakers have entered the train.
Duties upheld, as usual.

added_expressions.english: My apologies for having you on the chopping block.
And That is why I am called the best!

idle_expressions.english: No worries, I can cook a replacement.
I cultivated in the LIBRARY OF RUIN! I don't think you guys match me!
You are made of meat, yet meat ends up on your plate.
In a world where food is both flesh and meals, were do we cross the line?

added_expressions.english: How may we serve you dear guest?

idle_expressions.english: I'l do better next time...
May I offer you all some Gelato?
Tea? Bandages?
I am sure this will work? I GOT NO IDEA.
Don't mind my quirks, I am still getting adjustments by The Colors.

added_expressions.english: It feels odd to be back on a train after so long.

idle_expressions.english: Time barely passed for them, and yet they go into the fray with little downtime.
Has anyone seen Mint?
I don't want Mint to be hurt again.
The air feels different, a different magic is at play.

added_expressions.english: Sweetkin, this for me to do the critic's bidding.
Prepare to be judged and balanced!

idle_expressions.english: What is it about not being allowed to talk about balance?
Made by Rosette, to serve in the critic's image...
May we be balanced by the Rising Dusk.
Here's a tip.
I paid good money to visit Haven.
I only expect the best from the staff.
*Vines grab nearby snacks*
*Something stirs within the metal shell*

added_expressions.english: I thought I barely managed to survive, but I ended up in another crisis…
Can't make any mistakes. If I'm not careful, I might die here.
…I'm gonna throw books at you if you scare me… So please don't come at me…
Think I will just let you take the book here as you want?
This atmosphere is pretty decent, isn't it? There are no intimidating warning noises.

idle_expressions.english: I wonder what this guy's book says… Aren't you curious?
Let's retrieve the books and go back now! I wanna get done with sorting 'em and take my fill of rest.
Why don't we sit around and read some books together when we get back, friends?
We should…sort the books first, but… Aren't you guys curious about what these books say…?

added_expressions.english: Rosette, Aspect of Desire at your service.
Who will be next to play with me?

idle_expressions.english: Rowdy clients takes the door, that's the rule!
It's always nice to see something you made become more grandiose over time.
Sally really outdid herself time and time again.
Dear guest, I hope my Sweetkins have entertained you as much as they did for me.
The Sweetkin were featured in a fan game for their third appearance.
Exas is the creator of the Sweetkin clan mod!
Exas would like to make a mechanical or digital clan in the future.
Exas would like to make a clan around Dominion and the original sin.
Most Sweetkins have been created at the time of the first visit to this world.
The Sweetkins had 4 official adventures.
Exas is really proud of EPP: Last Ember.
Mint canonically died in the Library.
Sally got cursed with EGO by Red.
Sally's distortion is called Lone Sprout.
Sally's EGO is called Forest of Evergreen.
Mint is married to the formerly nameless Siren, Cookie.
Mint's design is inspired by Breath of the Wild's great fairies.
The Sweetkins went to the Library of Ruina because of the vertical difficulty curve.
Rosette and their siblings are named after Colors.
The Sweetkin were daydreamed because of Idle Apocalypse.
Vanilla is the firstborn of all Sweetkins.
The Sweetkin's firstborn is too tall for the train.
Swettling and Sally were first designed for Legend of Keepers, but never were modded in.
Sally was originally Rosette's concubine, but instead became a fierce protector.
Will you be my new host?
Terrifyingly delicious!

added_expressions.english: Time to do some field work!

idle_expressions.english: The Dominion pathogen seems to create chimeric infections.
The Savagery strain is to be kept away from instinctual individuals as it incubate faster.
Such a chaotic genome! Entropy specimens will be difficult.
Savagery specimens show similar infection rates as the Hellhorned.
With so many eyes, perhaps an ocular infection.

added_expressions.english: We live to serve our guest.
We live to protect our kind.
We live to assist those in need.

idle_expressions.english: In service of Lady Mint's Ice cream Parlor.
This Floor is off Limit dear guest.
May I offer you all some Gelato?
Don't eat too quick or you risk a brain freeze.
*Does puppy eyes*
*Runs around*
*Dove cooing*
On the right you can see...
Don't mind the titan induced corruption, we are helping fix that.
Are you here for the Dinner Spectacle?

added_expressions.english: Cleanup as arrived. Keep the permanent casualties low!

idle_expressions.english: Time to clean em out.
Ally down, moving in to supress.
Easier than the Library.
Sally's orders: detain Librarians on sight.

added_expressions.english: This world's inhabitants are under my protection.

idle_expressions.english: We don't cater to customers who play rough.
I'm doing this for your future, Cookie.
I must remain vigilant. I cannot repeat the Library incident.
Come and stay a while.

descriptions.english: 100% discount on shop rerolls. Does not include 'Covenant taxes'

lore_tooltips.english: A mysterious brochure written in an ever changing dialect. It advertises a place of relaxation defined by gluttonny and lust. The Merchants seem a lot eager to show their other wares at the simple sight of this piece of paper.
Mucus Refined into a protective paste. It stays fresh even after being left outside or near the boilers.
A dusty framed drawing. Nine creature are drawn with no features akin to HellBorn or Angels.
'It's much easier to modify preexisting artefacts than making a completely new one. This is why the symbolism of an object is so important when using everyday objects as a base.' -Rosette
That one Relic made from scrap and broken descriptions. Works like a charm at least!

descriptions.english: Gain 5 [coin] when a unit is Eaten.

lore_tooltips.english: Golden kernels used to enhance meals. Some look just like small gold nuggets.
A Jar of Mucus produced by Rosette. It contains enzymes that replicates various flavours and medecines mixed with it. An ingredient of the Sweetkins.

descriptions.english: Summon a a crab cake or a Danger noodle at the end of the turn.
Summon a Random VIP at the end of the turn.
